WizardTD

Class Gremlin

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Monster
      • WizardTD.Gremlin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Moveable

    public class Gremlin
extends Monster
implements Moveable
    The Gremlin class represents a gremlin monster in the WizardTD game. The gremlin is a type of monster that can move along a path and has its own unique attributes and behaviors. The class provides methods to get and set the gremlin's attributes, draw the gremlin, update its position, and handle its interactions with other game entities.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gremlin

        public Gremlin(int x,
               int y,
               processing.core.PImage sprite,
               float hp,
               float speed,
               float armour,
               int manaGainedOnKill,
               int quantity)
        Constructor to initialize a Gremlin object with the given attributes.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate of the gremlin's initial position.
        y - The y-coordinate of the gremlin's initial position.
        sprite - The image representing the gremlin.
        hp - The gremlin's health points.
        speed - The gremlin's movement speed.
        armour - The gremlin's armor value.
        manaGainedOnKill - The amount of mana gained when the gremlin is killed.
        quantity - The number of gremlins.

      • getDying

        public boolean getDying()
        Retrieves the dying status of the entity.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is in the process of dying; false otherwise.

      • isDying

        public boolean isDying()
        Updates and checks the dying animation frames for the entity. The method increments the counter and updates the sprite based on the counter's value. Once the dying animation is complete, the entity is marked as dead.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is still in the dying animation; false if the entity has completed the dying animation and is dead.

      • getDead

        public boolean getDead()
        Retrieves the dead status of the entity.
        Returns:
        true if the entity is dead; false otherwise.
